name: Defend I.T. Solutions
tagline: Local Cybersecurity & I.T. Support You Can Trust
description: Whether you're a homeowner, retiree, or small business owner, we deliver on-site cybersecurity and tech support that's tailored to you. No tech jargon. No surprise fees. Just real help from someone who understands your needs.

services_cta.headline: Need local IT help you can trust?
services_cta.subtext: We come to you. Fast, friendly, and secure. Book your free consultation today.
